name: Vulpes Ventures
description:
Vulpes Ventures is the venture capital group within Vulpes Investment Management Pte Ltd, a Singapore-based alternative investment manager. Vulpes Ventures takes a flexible and unencumbered approach to venture investing and seeks to empower entrepreneurs to reach their full potential.

Vulpes is the successor to Artradis Fund Management and was founded in 2011 by Stephen Diggle, co-founder and former managing partner of the multi award-winning fund management company.

Vulpes has been investing in Venture Capital in Southeast Asia for over a decade and was an early investor in two of Singapore's first unicorns, PropertyGuru and Trax. Vulpes is also limited partners in a number of venture funds. Vulpes Ventures is the venture capital arm of Vulpes.
